testcase.name: User logs in and verifies product listing
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the login page.............................................passed When user logs in with valid credentials....................................passed Then product listing is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: User sorts product listing and adds to cart
testcase.system-out: Given user sorts product listing by "Price (low to high)"...................passed When user adds first 3 low-priced products to cart..........................passed And user proceeds to checkout...............................................passed Then verify cart contains 3 items...........................................passed
